custom-meta.meta-value: Data are owned by the Health Department of the San Luis Potosí State, which is a third party. The data on acute respiratory infections can be accessed at the Mexican Health Ministry website (Dirección General de Epidemiología, Secretaría de Salud) at: http://www.epidemiologia.salud.gob.mx/dgae/boletin/intd_boletin.html.
